title: Low-Priorty Ban
body:
So I have been put on the low priority ban list for 10minutes and anyways i have waited for the 10 minutes and it just keeps resetting instead of putting me into the queue...How do i fix this? 
Please help me

replies.body: How long does it take because I have sent one with no reply
If you're playing bots it resets the timer.
I am trying to play normals
Sir, i don't understand where you are getting at.
